text: Nuko (Abisiraheli) tubagabanyamo amoko cumi n’abiri, tunahishurira Musa ubwo abantu be bamusabaga amazi yo kunywa (tugira tuti) “Kubita inkoni yawe ku ibuye!” Nuko (arikubise) riturikamo amasoko cumi n’abiri, maze buri muryango umenya aho unywera. Twanabugamishije mu gicucu cy’igicu (igihe bayobagurikaga mu butayu bavuye mu Misiri) ndetse tunabamanurira Manu na Saluwa (tuvuga tuti) “Nimurye mu byiza twabafunguriye!” Si twe bahemukiye ahubwo ni bo ubwabo bihemukiye
